r.s: APM and distributed tracing for PHP
r.d: The Datadog PHP Tracer brings APM and distributed tracing to PHP.
r.n:
**WARNING**: Users doing manual instrumentation using the `GlobalTracer::get()->startActiveSpan()` api should update to this version from 0.63.0 and 0.64.0.
### Fixed - Fix span start times of userland spans (#1312)
